Rulings.Edison:
● If you choose to activate this effect, you must target at least 1 card on the field.
● Sending cards is a cost, not an effect. 
  If this card's summon is successful, you'll send cards and declare targets. Afterwards, "Pulling the Rug" may be chained.
Rulings.Tengu: ● If you choose to activate this effect, you must target at least 1 card on the field.

Rulings.Cat:
● Sending the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY is a cost.
● 'Celestia, Lightsworn Angel's' effect can't be activated while 'Macro Cosmos', etc. is applying.
● If you activate 'Celestia, Lightsworn Angel's' effect, you must choose 1 or 2 of your opponent's cards to destroy.

Rulings.Base: 1. Sending the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY is a cost.\n2. The effect of "Celestia, Lightsworn Angel" cannot be activated while "Macro Cosmos", etc. is active.\n3. If you activate the effect of "Celestia, Lightsworn Angel", you must choose 1 or 2 of your opponent's cards to destroy.

PSCT.Edison:
① When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tribute Summoning a "Lightsworn" monster:
You can send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY, then target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy those targets.
